text:
Hello <@UATE4ATHP>,
Do you know how to update the module every time I select a filter?
Look, I currently present the problem that when the module is already loaded in the web display, I have empty spaces.
access to the HubSpot code or profile?
The problem is that the module was made by a fiver developer, but apparently the structure is giving me problems for what I need
start with a link and a screen shot of the module code

How would you go about building a module or an editable area of a page that never needs to be used again? Modules are re-usable but this just needs to be an editable section. Can you point me to the right guide if there is one?

I’d suggest using a module for this, even if you’re not going to be reusing it — the editor experience of modules is much better than any of the alternative solutions.

To keep the editor sidebar clean and prevent users from potentially placing it on other pages, you can set the `is_available_for_new_content` property in the module’s meta.json to `false`. (this can also be found as a toggle switch in the top-right of the module editor view in Design Tools)

To place it on a page, just call it with a `{% module %}` tag in the appropriate template!
